basic.description: A systematic introduction to nuclear and particle physics for advanced physics students. Topics include basic nuclear properties: size, mass, decay and reactions; shell model of nuclear structure; magnetic moments; gamma and beta decay; quark model of elementary particles; and strong, electromagnetic and weak interactions.
basic.subject: ENPH
basic.title: Nuclear And Particle Physics

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ: ENPH 345 or PHYS 345 and registered in BSCE.
